post.body: Hello ZeroMe!
I'M Back! HaHaHa
Why there are no peers for zero Talk, zero Blog, and Mail? I can't down them.
Any programmmer can teach me how to build a page on zeronent? I want to hold a page and maintain it. Thanks
Fresh and freedom
It' that true?
It' that true?
怎么在聊天室发言捏？为什么提示要用id登录，但是没有选择id的那个选择项？
As a network technique newbie, I have no knowledge on most of the fields. But I want to know if the zeronet a decentralized or distributed network? Thanks!
Goood Night Zeronet
Why it shows that "Your Browser is not safe",  But it in tor alw?ays mode?
A lot of things puzzled me. Where is the future? Where is the True way to go? Life is circle but a miracle.
Morning> The zeronet is deactive day by day. No one share useful and instructive resource. Blogs are updated slowly or stop updating. Chatting room are all visitors without active conmunicaitons.
What hell is it? Anything wrong with this .exe file? There is a warning for the Tor.exe too. How shall I deal with it?
Good Day
Love TVs like this：http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BEJbnufyav7TK23ADTs2Qi2UJeKSGDzw6/familyguy.html
最近好像有热闹起来了。厚厚哈嘿
gud mao ning.

Lazy day.
Hello zeroNeters.

Last night, Mr Guo Weigui had a live on youtube with an Chinese reviewer. During the 2 hours talk, he talked about the economy, politics, culture about China, including real estate, stock market, banking and financing, investment, etc. 
There were 10k people online with him, and they discussed, debated, spoke dirty words to each other. 
I was an audience too. I think Guo is really a successful businessman and have good eloquence on speech. 
He said he was busy in preparation the globall press conference in the near future. 
I have a little expectation on this press, who knows what news will be exposed and brought to light.
What's your opinion? What's kind of person do you think Mr. Guo is? What's the deep motivation of his activities on twitter or MingJing News? 
Welcome to dicuss and express your opinon on this event.
昨天晚上，郭文贵在油管上与一中国评论员进行了一场直播对话。在两个小时的时间里，他谈到了中国的经济、政治、文化，包括房地产、股市、银行和金融，投资等方面。
在直播过程中，有超过1万人在线参与其中，他们有的讨论，有的辩证，有的互相攻击。
我同样作为一名观众，觉得郭的确是一名成功的商人并且有很好的演讲口才。
他说他正在忙着准备不久后的全球新闻发布会。
我对他的发布会还是有一点小期待，毕竟谁也不知道有什么新闻被曝光。
你有什么看法吗？你认为郭在你眼中是怎样的一个人？他在推特、明镜新闻等地方这些动作做的深层次动机到底是什么？
欢迎参与讨论，并表达你对此事件的看法。

comment.body: @ZeroCoin: 多谢补充！
@Chocodum: thanks

@Rythyrix: I just leave for some reasons of censorship block on the zeronet. Cause I can't download anyone's page for a long while. In the beginning, I thought it might be my internet connection issues, but when I saw a waring tip"Your broswer is not safe" on the left top of the zeronet page, I realized there were something wrong. So I delete the all the files of the zeronet except the users.json, then download it from the offical site once again. Now I can use it freely. I am not going to leave zeronet, just something wrong blocked me out. The zeronet is funcionting again, and I'M Back!
@Bili: 为什么zerotalk，zeromail，zeroblog 我打开都显示没有peers呢？
@Booma: Thx.
@Border0464fred: Thanks for answering my question.
@cyberslave: thanks bro.
@Kaffie: Thanks.
@ZAlex: yeah, it makes me understand much more.
@Krixano: Moring and Hi.

@Firebox: but Tor browser is bolcked by Chinese Gov. I cant open Tor without using a VPN client or proxy. But when I use a VPN (freegate), and start Tor browser setting 127.0.0.1 to the "No peoxy for" field, but when I copy the home page of 0net, it shows nothing but a blank page. any ideas on it.
@P2P: Thanks. It works. One more question: Dose this setting weaken the privacy or anonymity of Tor browser?
@Dav02: Thanks for helping.

@Centurion: I have one more question, could you make a short explanation for me. For the Tor bridge, it's opening for everybody, so I can apply for an obfuscation4 bridge. If the ISP supplier or Govt. wants apply the bridge, it also can get the bridge easily, then they can block the bridge to the censorship system, such as GFW etc. How could the bridges be live under the censorhip?
@0utput: thanks. I always thinks that I PC is hacked or compromised by some hackers or malwares. Maybe I need to reinstall my OS once with a total format.

@Flyman: I don't have any good ideas now. As a zeronet users from Mainland China, using zeronet needs some basic knowledges and some anti-GWF methods, so many common people here don't know zeronet. The language barrier is one of the largest obstacles for chinese people using it, and the GFW blocks most poeple outside. In nowadays, zeronet is a relavtive free platform to express person opinion without being afraid of censorship by Govt. nevertheless, it just a alternative type of communication between acquaintances.
@Krixano: Thanks for help.
这是一个去中心化的网络，具体作用看个人怎么利用。分享信息、资源什么的。我最近计划把我以前在其他地方写过的文章全部放到上面来。
@ZeroNet: 怎么把将评论的文字加上你这样的连接地址呢?对网页只是比较白。
@ZeroNet: 谢谢指教。

@0utput: Thanks so much for your patience to answer my questions. I heard lots about the Linux OS but I didn't have a try for it. Maybe the windows OS comes to my cyber life first, and give me an strong improssion on it, so when I thought I should transfer to the Linux, there are so many worries standing front of me, such as "how to  choose a suitable one from those various versions, ubuntu, debian, centos,etc. It's really hard to make a choice. And as a office labor, the Microsoft Office is another mountain that I can't over pass. A lot of work need to use Word,Excel, Powerpoint. If I shift to Linux, I even don't know how can I deal with the daily job with it. So, do you have any good advice for solve these issues. Thanks.
欢迎加入灵网（welcome to zeronet）
@Mobile: 莫怕，就是个分布式互联网。
@Rythyrix: what does 5 or 6 mean？ Not quiet understand.
@Rythyrix: I am no quiet a technical guy on internet technology. I dont know which one I use for my internet, and have no idea to check out. any suggestion?
@Rythyrix: thanks for imparting knowledge.
bitsync 上一频道里了解有这么个东西，就谷歌了一下，下载了耍耍。
人各有志，只要有钱，啥妹子都可以泡，但不一定啥linux都搞定，啪啪啪是个正常男人都可以，但不是每个正常的男人都能折腾linux。妹子总会有的。只是你那款还没碰到你。
这个是不是要申请什么呼号，才可以用？
